title: Terma - Hidden Treasure Teachings
description: Secret teachings revealed when the student is ready

teachings.title: The Nature of Mind
teachings.teaching: The mind is like the sky - thoughts are like clouds passing through. Do not grasp the clouds, rest in the vast openness of sky-like awareness. This is your true nature, always present, never obscured.

teachings.title: Recognizing Empty Luminosity
teachings.teaching: All phenomena arise from emptiness and return to emptiness, yet they shine with luminous clarity. Like a rainbow - empty of substance, yet vividly appearing. Your thoughts, emotions, and experiences are the same.

teachings.title: The Vajra Body
teachings.teaching: Your body is not merely flesh and bone - it is a mandala of wisdom. The channels carry winds of awareness, the chakras are wheels of transformation. Treat this sacred vehicle with respect and care.

teachings.title: Transforming Obstacles
teachings.teaching: Obstacles are not enemies to defeat but teachers to embrace. Like alchemical gold emerging from lead, wisdom arises from difficulty. The very poison becomes medicine when met with awareness.

teachings.title: The Essence of Guru Yoga
teachings.teaching: The true guru is not outside but the awakened nature within. When you see me, you see your own wisdom reflected back. I am the mirror showing you what you already are.
